title: [Editorial] Venezuela: health beyond the political turmoil

title: [Comment] The SCIENCE trial: surgery or not for medial epicondyle fractures

title: [Comment] TRPC6 inhibition: podocyte-targeted treatment for focal segmental glomerulosclerosis?
content_summary: Focal segmental glomerulosclerosis (FSGS) is a histological pattern of kidney damage.1 While it is a consequence of any cause of chronic kidney failure, the term FSGS is often considered to be a disease due to podocytopathy, which is a pathological alteration in podocytes, the complex interdigitated...

title: [Comment] Beyond integrase: the rise of doravirine and islatravir in HIV management
content_summary: Combination antiretroviral therapy (ART) has transformed HIV-1 infection into a chronic condition with near-normal life expectancy. For more than two decades, the standard regimen has been a three-drug regimen, typically consisting of two nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitors plus a third agen...

title: [Comment] A risk to child health: confusion and concern over changes to US vaccine policy

title: Can H5N1 avian influenza in dairy cattle be contained in the US?
content_summary: The emergence and sustained spread of H5N1 in US dairy cattle since 2024 have demonstrated that highly pathogenic avian influenza (HPAI) is capable of establishing long-term transmission in livestock. title: Shifting paradigms in tissue stem cell biology: Insights from the intestine
content_summary: This review provides a comprehensive overview of the intestinal crypt and its diverse cell types, highlighting their roles in nutrient absorption, mucus production, antimicrobial defense, and GLP-1-regulated metabolism.
